xxl.core.indexStructures
Class ORTree.Node.SplitInfo

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.indexStructures.Tree.Node.SplitInfo
      xxl.core.indexStructures.ORTree.Node.SplitInfo
Direct Known Subclasses:
RTree.Node.SplitInfo
Enclosing class:
ORTree.Node
public class ORTree.Node.SplitInfo
extends Tree.Node.SplitInfo

SplitInfo contains information about a split. The enclosing Object of this SplitInfo-Object (i.e. Node.this) is the new node that was created by the split.

Field Summary
protected  Descriptor newDescriptor
          The descriptor of the new node created during the split.
